name: DataStarWriteFile
description: Writes the specified content to a file replacing variables
author: Absolute Technology Limited
releaseNotes: The task writes TFS variables to a Json file.

inputs.name: FilePath
inputs.label: File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path of the file including its name.

inputs.name: FileContent
inputs.label: File Content
inputs.helpMarkDown: The content of the file, any variables included in the content will be replaced.

inputs.name: FailOnStderr
inputs.label: Fail on Standard Error
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is true, this task will fail if any errors are written to the StandardError stream.

inputs.name: OverwriteFile
inputs.label: Overwrite File
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is true, this task will overwrite the file if exists.
